original: ** MAP BY Hannibal [SPA] (Rafuron) **
zh_trans: ** 地图作者 汉尼拔 Hannibal [西班牙] (Rafuron) **

original: ** Thanks to Kaemon **
zh_trans: ** 感谢 Kaemon **

original: ** This is the first round. Wait for more players to restart round or suicide. **
zh_trans: ** 这是第一回合。等待更多玩家加入来重新开始这一轮或选择放弃。**

original: ** WARMUP ROUND **
zh_trans: ** 热身回合**

original: ** Tip 1 : press +use on pickable objects to build barricades **
zh_trans: ** 提示 1：可拾取的物体按“E”键来建造障碍物，如果不知道怎么用请不要乱用 **

original: ** Tip 2 : reach and win the end of a stage to level up **
zh_trans: ** 提示 2：到达终点并通关的人会自动提升一级 **

original: ** Tip 3 : take items at zombie and human shops in spawn **
zh_trans: ** 提示 3：等级可用于在出生点的僵尸商店和人类商店获取神器或皮肤**

original: ** WARMUP ROUND ** ROUND RESTART IN 60 SECONDS **
zh_trans: ** 热身回合** ** 60 秒后重新开始回合**

original: ** Tip 4 : your current level is always displayed on new rounds or your kill score divided by 100 approximately **
zh_trans: ** 提示 4：当前等级通常会在回合开始时显示，也可通过按TAB分数面板，将自己的“得分”除以100，即为当前等级。**

original: ** Tip 5 : barricades health depends on the size and material **
zh_trans: ** 提示 5：障碍物的生命值取决于其大小和种类 **

original: ** Tip 6 : hold spots tend to be long * hold as much as possible at previous positions **
zh_trans: ** 提示 6：防守时间往往是较久的 * 尽可能不要贴门防守 **

original: ** Tip 7 : guards work as stoppers * but you can shoot throught them **
zh_trans: ** 提示 7：守卫能阻挡僵尸 * 且不会挡子弹 **

original: ** Tip 8 : the ladder and bomb items are powerful items * you must kill these zombies the first! **
zh_trans: ** 提示 8：梯子和TNT是很强的僵尸神器 * 必须随时注意他们的动向！**

original: ** Tip 9 : you must put the barricades BEHIND the guards to get maximum efficacy **
zh_trans: ** 提示 9：你可以将障碍物放置在守卫的后面，以获得最大的功效 **

original: ** Tip 10 : horse and armor (while shield is not broken) items can push zombies **
zh_trans: ** 提示 10：骑兵和重甲的护盾未被破坏时，可以推动僵尸**

original: ** Tip 11 : Balrog scream heals near zombies and increases speed temporally **
zh_trans: ** 提示 11：炎魔的咆哮可以治疗附近的僵尸，并暂时提高他们的移动速度**

original: ** Tip 12 : the stage 4 WC is in the top of the second tower (turn right after the wooden ramp) **
zh_trans: ** 提示 12：第四关的厕所位于第二座塔的顶部（在木斜坡后右转）**

original: ** Tip 13 : Gandalf +You shall not pass!+ is DAWDS and White Knight is AADDSWSW **
zh_trans: ** 提示 13：甘道夫大招的操作是 DAWDS，高达大招的操作是 AADDSWSW**

original: ** WARMUP ROUND ** ROUND RESTART IN 10 SECONDS **
zh_trans: ** 热身回合 ** 回合将在 10 秒后重新开始 **

original: ** WARMUP ROUND IS OVER! **
zh_trans: ** 热身结束! **

original: ** STARTING AT FIRST LEVEL! **
zh_trans: ** 从第一关开始！**

original: **CURRENT STAGE >> PART 1 >> OSGILIATH **
zh_trans: ** 当前关卡 >> 第一关 >> 奥斯吉力亚斯 **

original: ** THE ROUND WILL START IN FEW SECONDS ** CHECK YOUR LEVEL AND PROCEED TO BUY AN ITEM **
zh_trans: ** 回合即将开始 ** 检查您的等级并前往商店获得神器 **

original: ** THE ROUND HAS STARTED ** TAKE ONE OF THE PORTALS ** MASSIVE TELEPORTATION IN 20 SECONDS **
zh_trans: ** 回合已开始 ** 选择一个传送门 ** 20 秒后进行传送 **

original: ** THE BOATS ARE COMMING ** PREPARE YOURSELVES **
zh_trans: ** 船来了 ** 做好准备 **

original: ** RESIST 25 SECONDS! **
** RETREAT !! RIVER ZONE IS LOST **
zh_trans: ** 撤退！！河流区域失守了 **

original: ** WATCH OUT! WE ARE UNDER SIEGE **
zh_trans: ** 小心！我们正被围攻 **

original: ** DEFEND OSGILIATH! WE ARE NOT LEAVING THIS PLACE WITHOUT FIGHT! (30 SECONDS)**
zh_trans: ** 保卫奥斯吉力亚斯！我们绝不会不战而退！(30 秒)**

original: ** OSGILIATH IS LOST ** RETREAT ! **
zh_trans: ** 奥斯吉力亚斯失守 ** 撤退！**

original: ** TAKE THE HORSES **
zh_trans: ** 骑上那些马 **

original: ** DOOR IS OPENING **
zh_trans: ** 门正在打开 **

original: ** ZOMBIES ARE COMMING! CLOSE THE DOOR! **
zh_trans: ** 僵尸来了！把门关上！**

original: ** DOOR IS CLOSED **
zh_trans: ** 门已关闭 **

original: ** KILL THE REMAINING ZOMBIES! **
zh_trans: ** 杀死剩余的僵尸！**

original: ** STAGE COMPLETED **
zh_trans: ** 关卡完成 **

original: **CURRENT STAGE >> PART 2 >> MAIN GATES **
zh_trans: ** 当前关卡 >> 第二关 >> 米那斯提力斯主城门 **

original: ** THIS IS OUT OF CONTROL! RETREAT NOW ! **
zh_trans: ** 战况已失控！快撤退！ **

original: ** ORCS HAVE IRRUPTED THROUGH OUR DEFENSES ** RETREAT **
zh_trans: ** 兽人已经冲破了我们的防线 ** 撤退 **

original: ** WATCH OUT! **
** SIEGE TOWERS HAVE BEEN SET UP ** WE HAVE LOST THE WALLS ** RETREAT **
zh_trans: ** 兽人已架设攻城塔 ** 我们失去了城墙的控制权 ** 撤退 **

original: ** RETREAT! **
** THIS IS THE LAST STAND AT FIRST LEVEL ** FIGHT UNTIL THE SIGNAL **
zh_trans: ** 背水一战 ** 战斗至号角信号出现！ **

original: ** USE THE BARRICADES TO LOCK THE GATES OR DEFEND 60 SECONDS ! **
zh_trans: ** 使用障碍物封住大门或坚守 60 秒！**

original: ** DOOR 2 LOCKED **
zh_trans: ** 2 号门已关闭 **

original: ** DOOR 1 LOCKED **
zh_trans: ** 1 号门已关闭 **

original: ** DOORS LOCKED **
zh_trans: ** 门都关上了 **
